name: David Price
title: Cofounder & General Partner, CEO
bio: As CEO of PWV, David leads the fund's strategy, operations, and founder experience, bringing operator instincts, deep product and industry fluency, and a track record of turning signal into scale. A repeat founder and investor, he's scaled companies across AI, dev tools, fintech, and climatetech, and holds multiple patents and board seats.
hoverLine: The product and leadership GP that will take your company and fund to the next level.
